Reviews.Title: Excellent HD alternative
Reviews.Author: johnmarco
Reviews.Content: I've been very satisfied with this TV. I typically watch the HDTV in the living room, then go to my bedroom to watch this TV, and I think this picture still looks really good. The size and weight are ... formidable, so be ready to work hard to get it where you want it, and do get a heavy duty stand, because it weighs over 200 lbs, and if you try to swap out a 32 incher for this you may find your stand flattened like a roadside squirrel. The only complaint I have with this TV is that it occasionally emits a high-pitched buzz for 30 seconds or so, and then goes back to quiet. Until flat-panel TV's get much, much cheaper, this TV is an excellent alternative for decent screen size and sub-1000 dollar price.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Melissa DeLong "Missy"
Reviews.Content: I have had my Trinitron for about 10 years now. It is still a great tv. At the time we didn't like the rectangular screens. We wanted a regular square screen that was good quality and we found it with this tv. It has never given us any problems. The only draw back is the weight. We moved into our current house 8 years ago. We placed the tv where we thought best and it hasn't moved since. I recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Greatest $700 Spent.
Reviews.Author: Oscar Burgos Jr. "BoogieNYC"
Reviews.Content: Looking for a great quality picture tv but don't have the money or desire for a plasma or LCD? This is the way to go. I have had this tv for abut a year and have not had a single problem with it. I totally recommend it. The ONLY negative thing about this is the weight. It's about 200+ pounds so better get some friends together to lift this bad boy.

Reviews.Title: Big lug of a TV, but awesome picture.
Reviews.Author: Darik D. Dvorshak "Darik"
Reviews.Content: Got this used at a thrift store for less than $100. Wow it is heavy, over 200 pounds.  Mine was manufactured 2005, has a digital tuner built in.  But its just a monitor for the Wii!  Since the Wii doesnt use HD this TV/monitor this will serve for at least a year and probably more.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: Feisty629
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV in 1999.  We are still using it and what a fantastic picture.  This TV has been absolutely flawless.  Color and clarity are still to this day really great.  The only draw back is the unit is very heavy to move around.

Reviews.Title: Poor Durability
Reviews.Author: J. Soto
Reviews.Content: Died after 23 months.  $500 to repair.  It's better to buy something other than Sony.  They are taking a hit in quality as of late.
